graph.topic: advantages and disadvantages of the prevalent of English

nodes.text: the prevalent of English brings a great number of benefits for people
it promotes the communication and interaction between different countries more conveniently and clearly
the innovation of plane and train solved the geographical barriers
If we can popularize the use of English, the language hinder will disappear as well
English is a beautiful language, which is more systematical and extensive than many other languages
Learning English can foster people's sentiment and nourish their literature and art
In the ancient time, the different languages and geography set barriers for people to exchange their goods and ideas
the dominated status of English has destroyed culture diversity
it does not express every detail of life especially in Asia countries, which have totally different linguistic system
language contains many aspects of people's daily life, which is influenced by culture, environment as well as religious
these languages have special significance for people who belong to them
using English to replace them is crudity
English as an elegant language should be advocated in many fields to expand the global trade and communications
we still need preserve other languages for sake of keeping the linguistic and cultural diversity
